articles.title: Soccer-Move over Messi - Argentina has a new hero - CNA
articles.description: BRASILIA:     Emiliano Martinez needed only a month to establish himself as Argentina's number one goalkeeper and on Tuesday he became a new national hero by saving three times in a shootout in their Copa America semi-final against Colombia.
